short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View image metadata and GPS location from the right-click context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an option in the right click context menu to view metadata of an image.
Displays:
- Dimensions
- Aspect Ratio
- File Type
- File Size
- Source location
- GPS Location (if contained in image)
